House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to require airports receiving grants to be in compliance with airport security requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to preclude approval of an airport project grant application unless the Secretary of Transportation determines that the applicant airport operator is in compliance with all relevant Federal regulations and requirements relating to airport security.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to require airports receiving grants to be in compliance with airport security requirements.
